text: <@UG52C29EE> Sorry to ask you again about this.... i was holding back but now i came back to and cannot get it to work. So, to begin with, let's clarify a few things (=even though i've tried many options here). Column "13" is the foreign id referring to a related table.... then id: is the id of the related table row, the name: is the column name of the related table column that is displayed in the secondary table, and type: well... type.... Â¿Is this alright?
<@UG52C29EE> so got it working... trial and error right? I removed the "name", so just id and type, and added that into an array... :slightly_smiling_face:
